response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. I am confident that this offer provides an excellent value while ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially making this dream product yours.", "product_price": 950000}
